entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
